org.openlca.core.matrix

Class FlowIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlca.core.matrix.FlowIndex

  • public class FlowIndex
extends Object
    A flow index represents the flows in the intervention matrix. Thus, this index maps each flow to a row in the intervention matrix.
